bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of swollen and painful knees, calves, and feet, with difficulties in bending and stretching one’s legs. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry shui ying 水英：丈夫、婦人無故兩脚腫 滿，連膝脛中痛，屈伸急強者，名骨風 , “If men or women without apparent cause experience swelling of both feet, with pain reaching into the calves and knees, and bending and stretching [are hampered by] stiffness, this is called ‘ bone wind ’”.
